title: Chapter 2744: Exploding The Realm And Destroying The Godhood (4)
body:
Chapter 2744: Exploding The Realm And Destroying The Godhood (4)

Chapter 2744: Exploding the Realm and Destroying the Godhood (4)

Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

Elder Yu thought to himself, “Young man, you have to know… The old fox is the craftiest!”

However, Xu Xiaoshou, who was seated on the ghostly energy throne, did not move when he saw the huge Kun body.

The explosion was still rumbling…

He pointed his finger at the distance and shouted coldly, “I am the Heavenly Ancestor’s successor, how dare Kunpeng be impudent?”

Boom!

The world suddenly turned dark.

Elder Yu, who had transformed into the Kun body, saw Xu Xiaoshou high in the sky behind the ghostly energy throne, and a ferocious mouth appeared.

Inside, blood threads were flowing.

Suddenly, an incomparably huge eyeball gently rolled out. It looked over with an incomparably terrifying gaze.

“Get lost!”

…

The rumbling thunder came layer by layer, causing people to lose their minds.

The Heavenly Ancestor Image?

Cold sweat broke out on Elder Yu’s back. With this glance and shout, the momentum of his Kun body was halted.

Xu Xiaoshou had received the Heavenly Ancestor’s Legacy and obtained the Ten Ancestors Image.

How was this possible?

He had never used it before…

“Oh, that’s right, there was no need for it before… No! How much had this young man hidden?”

The Heavenly Ancestor’s will blocked the way.

Not to mention that Elder Yu already wanted to retreat.

Even if he wanted to charge forward, his Kun body was powerless to do so.

The Heavenly Ancestor’s eyeball that had split the sky…

With just one look, Elder Yu felt that if he took half a step forward, a shocking change would happen.

If he didn’t die, he would be severely injured!

“Sob…”

From Dao Xuanji’s perspective, nothing was visible.

The Kun Beast came from the horizon, and after pausing for a moment, it returned to the horizon to slack off.

“Yu Kunpeng!”

Dao Xuanji was furious. He thought, “Either you don’t come, or if you do, you block desperately. This advance and retreat, are you playing with me?”

However, it still bought some time.

When the Fourth Sword came at her face, she wanted to block them.

“No!”

In the distance, Beibei cried out in surprise.

A sword materialized, and she arrived before the vicious sword of the Five Great Divine Instruments of Chaos.

Only then did Dao Xuanji realize that she had been distracted by the power of guidance again.

There was a Fourth Sword in the vicious sword. If one wasn’t an ancient swordsman and thought they could block it with their physical body… they would die without even knowing how!

“A mere Beibei can be broken with a snap of a finger.”

Xu Xiaoshou didn’t have the arrogance of an ancient swordsman. After his expression changed, he locked his Three Loathsome Eyes onto her.

Beibei slapped her sword case, wanting to pull out the Supreme Emperor Sword…

The movements were cool, but the fancy front swing took too long.

Under the guidance of the aura, she looked over and saw Xu Xiaoshou’s strange left eye…

“Ah…”

Beibei’s body went limp, and she fell to the ground.

…

Dao Xuanji controlled the Xuanji great array and directly flashed into the array.

However, the fleeting teleportation gate, she wondered how Xu Xiaoshou, the sovereign of the Weaving Technique, could miss it.

The Fourth Sword slipped through the door crack, following into the Xuanji great array!

“Whoosh!”

The people of Jade Capital City were thrown into chaos.

They were seized by Ye Xiaotian.

Outside, Dao Xuanji was colossal, like a giant.

The Fourth Sword was also massive, slicing through the explosive waves, its sword energy boundless.

But suddenly, Dao Xuanji shrank as she entered, and the Fourth Sword shrank and followed.

There was no escape!

Did Xu Xiaoshou truly intend to kill Dao Xuanji every time he saw her?

He was utterly unreasonable!

“Elder Gu!”

Dao Xuanji let out a heart-wrenching scream.

Never in her life had she been in such a pitiful state!

In front of everyone, she was about to be chased by Xu Xiaoshou’s sword into Ye Xiaotian’s protection!

Dao Xuanji’s Dao Heart was on the verge of collapsing.

At that critical moment, Gu Yu, the current “Number One Sword Deity” of the five regions, sighed and stepped forward.

“A mere Sword Deity, do you dare to face me?”

Before he even moved, Xu Xiaoshou’s words reached him, and Gu Yu glanced over.

Amidst the dazzling light, the figure seated on the ghostly energy throne changed.

He transformed into a figure clad in black, standing on the rooftop of a lonely building beneath the full moon, with only a blurred silhouette of his back remaining.

“This!”

Gu Yu’s heart trembled.

He didn’t know that Xu Xiaoshou’s Heart Sword Technique imagery was that of the Sword God Gu Louying!

He didn’t have time to prepare for it.

At that moment, the black figure stood on the rooftop of the lone building, sword tilted, glancing sideways.

“In my eyes, all beings are devils.”

Boom!

Gu Yu barely pulled himself away from the imagery of the Sword God Gu Louying, but endless devilish energy began to rise from his body.

He could barely manage himself, let alone rescue Dao Xuanji.

…

“Whoosh!”

The black sword whistled through the air, right behind his head!

Dao Xuanji’s eyes widened in shock. She hastily formed a seal and turned to block.

“Divine Thirty-Six Forms, Grand…”

“Grand what? Dao Xuanji, your heart is in chaos!”

A faint chuckle suddenly echoed in her ears, “This is the Fantasy Sword Technique, didn’t you notice?”

As the voice fell, the scenes of the world turned into fluttering Hong Mei petals.

Xu Xiaoshou still sat calmly on the ghostly energy throne high in the sky.

But Ye Xiaotian had not taken control of Jade Capital City. Instead, Xu Xiaoshou, his second true body, stood beside him, holding his hand, stopping everything.

Everything that happened in Jade Capital City was real.

The only illusion was that the one holding the city was Xu Xiaoshou’s second true body. He also possessed space attributes and had a photographic memory, with the help of the Imitator, he could temporarily mimic Ye Xiaotian’s spiritual technique.

What Dao Xuanji entered wasn’t Ye Xiaotian’s World in the Palm, but Xu Xiaoshou’s second true body’s World in the Palm!

From start to finish, she was within Xu Xiaoshou’s control!

With a hiss, the word “Grand” was uttered, and the world froze.

Dao Xuanji’s pupils dilated as she watched the Fourth Sword pierce through her glabella and fly out from the back of her head.

In the distant world beyond, the ghostly beast figure sitting on the ghostly energy throne was enormous. It shook its head with a mocking smile.

“Remember, Dao Xuanji…”

“I’ll kill you every time I see you!”
